Title: Convolutional Deep Belief Networks for Scalable Unsupervised Learning of Hierarchical Representations
Author: Lee, H., Grosse, R., Ranganath, R. and Ng, A
Bibliography: [1]H. Lee, R. Grosse, R. Ranganath and A. Ng, 'Unsupervised learning of hierarchical representations with convolutional deep belief networks', Communications of the ACM, vol. 54, no. 10, p. 95, 2011. Available: 10.1145/2001269.2001295.
Brief summary: Presentation of an unsupervised deep learning model which presents performant image and object feature recognition, visual task recognition, and formation of hierarchical inference regarding images.
